scripts.linux-dev-cleanup: pnpm run linux-dev; pnpm run cleanup
scripts.linux-dev: exec pnpm run dev-server & echo $! > dev_server/PID && pnpm run build & tail -f /proc/$(cat dev_server/PID)/fd/1
scripts.build: rm -r dist; python scripts/py/handle_aliases.py -r; pnpm run move
scripts.move: python scripts/py/copy_files.py -i src -o dist -e "*.ts" -f; python scripts/py/copy_files.py -i node_modules/@tauri-apps -o dist/node_modules/@tauri-apps
